title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and mix quickly with the egg mixture and pancetta.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 2 hours.
Grill or cook chicken pieces until golden.
In a pan, cook tomato puree with cream and salt.
Add the chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
